price: Ka karɓi sadaka daga dũkiyõyinsu kana tsarkake su, kuma kana tabbatar da kirkinsu da ita. Kuma ka yi musu addu'a. Lallai addu'õ'inKa natsuwã ne a gare su. Kuma Allah ne Mai ji, Masani.
arabic: خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ صَدَقَةٗ تُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّيهِم بِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّ صَلَوٰتَكَ سَكَنٞ لَّهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
